name: The Factory (itch) (Josh Kitchen)
description:
Made for #GGJ20

Art by @jehjehrocket

The Factory is set in an authoritarian world populated by cute and cuddle characters!

You are a factory worker, tasked with repairing machines by placing/removing various gears.

But there is a plot to revolt against the Supreme Leader and bring forth democracy! Who will you side with? 

(there a 5 different endings, but some might be currently broken)
